SELECT sum(o.total_price) as sales_amount,
u.user_gender as user_gender, o.payment_type as payment_type,
COUNT(*) as sales_count, TO_CHAR(order_date, 'MM-dd') as daily_chart 'yy-MM') as month_chart 'YYYY') as year_chart
FROM order_list as o RIGHT join user_info u on o.user_email = u.user_email
WHERE 1=1 and order_status='배달 완료' and TO_CHAR(order_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') between #{start_date} and #{end_date}
and store_code = #{store_code}
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(order_date, 'MM-dd') 'yy-MM') 'YYYY') , user_gender , payment_type
ORDER BY daily_chart month_chart year_chart
